com.ibm.util.merge

Class TemplateCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.util.merge.TemplateCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String>

    public class TemplateCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String>
    The Class TemplateCache provides a cache of all templates used in the merge process. The cache has get / put / post / delete method that should map to a Rest Interface. Initial templates are loaded from the configured Config.loadFolder if it exists.
    Author:
    Mike Storey

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Instantiates a new template cache.
